properties.areaDesc: Camden, MO; Dallas, MO; Laclede, MO; Miller, MO
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 10 at 5:56PM CST until December 10 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
At 556 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Camdenton to 8 miles southeast of Macks Creek to
12 miles east of Urbana, moving northeast at 60 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

Locations impacted include...
Lake of The Ozarks...             Lake of The Ozarks State Park...
Ha Ha Tonka State Park...         Osage Beach...
Camdenton...                      Linn Creek...
Brumley...                        Ulman...
Leadmine...                       Freedom...
Kaiser...                         Decaturville...
Montreal...                       Roach...
Wet Glaize...                     Old Linn Creek...
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and
southwestern Missouri.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

NWSheadline: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN DALLAS...SOUTHWESTERN MILLER...NORTHWESTERN LACLEDE AND SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN COUNTIES

properties.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 10 at 5:19PM CST until December 10 at 11:00PM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
TORNADO WATCH 552 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR
THE FOLLOWING AREAS

IN ILLINOIS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES

IN SOUTH CENTRAL ILLINOIS

WASHINGTON

IN SOUTHWEST ILLINOIS

MONROE                RANDOLPH              SAINT CLAIR

IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES

IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI

CRAWFORD              JEFFERSON             WASHINGTON

IN SOUTHEAST MISSOURI

IRON                  MADISON               REYNOLDS
SAINT FRANCOIS        SAINTE GENEVIEVE

THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BELLEVILLE, CAHOKIA, CHESTER,
FARMINGTON, AND SPARTA.

properties.areaDesc: Laclede, MO; Webster, MO; Wright, MO
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 10 at 5:59PM CST until December 10 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northern Webster County in southwestern Missouri...
Northwestern Wright County in southwestern Missouri...
Southwestern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri...

* Until 630 PM CST.

* At 559 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located near Strafford, moving northeast at 55 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* Locations impacted include...
Marshfield...                     Conway...
Niangua...                        Duncan...
Phillipsburg...                   Rader...
Grovespring...                    Northview...

This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 90 and 109, and
between mile markers 112 and 117.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 6:30 PM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
CMAMlongtext: National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 6:30 PM CST. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.
